assignmentthree

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignmentthree.Product
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Book, Electronic

    public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the encapsulation of an Item for the eStore. It is extended by book and electronic.
